TopicTitle: Today's APOD Looks Like KSP Resources

Articles.Content:
![MercuryGravity_MESSENGER_960.jpg](http://apod.nasa.gov/apod/image/1505/MercuryGravity_MESSENGER_960.jpg)

At first glace, this looks like my map-view in KSP after using the polar surveyor ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Source: [http://apod.nasa.gov/apod/ap150505.html](http://apod.nasa.gov/apod/ap150505.html)
Very little ore there, they should try somewhere else.
I would love to have such overlay for resources in KSP. Is there any modder interested in making such mod? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> I would love to have such overlay for resources in KSP. Is there any modder interested in making such mod? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

The one in-game is pretty close to this! There's options that allow you to change the style and color ... this is the closest screenshot I could find, but there is one that is a gradient with the colors green/yellow/red that look almost the same as above ... similar to the image below.

The color/style can be changed in several places ... one is on the scanner itself, the other is on the map view if you have the planet/moon targeted and go into the new KB icon on the right.

![XLH1csC.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/XLH1csC.jpg)
